Data: 2 pm Sri Lanka have won the toss and will have a bat.
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run going across Tharanga from a length, not much pace first up, and left alone easily
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run more pace on this one now from Lee, 134.7 kph, much fuller too, Tharanga is not particularly to the pitch and pushes carefully to mid off
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run goes back of a length now, so three different lengths in three deliveries from Lee, Tharanga keeps it down on the leg side and Lee rushes forward to field
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run Lee puts more effort in a shortish one, hits Tharanga hard on the bat as he pushes towards cover
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run pitched up and heading for off stump, 137.9 kph, Tharanga blocks with a straight bat, just a touch late in getting bat down
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run opens the bat face late and runs a back of a length ball around middle to point, nothing in terms of width from Lee
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run he is on target right away too, around that off stump, going across, Dilshan shuffles around and pushes towards point
Bollinger to Dilshan, 1 run more bounce as he goes back of a length, Dilshan pushes purposefully in front of cover with an open face and they take the first run of the game
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run Dougie gets the angle going, in the left-hander from short of a length, and he takes it on the body as he misses the work on the leg side

Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run now he goes outside off stump, Dougie, and gets lots of bounce as it moves away from back of a length, Tharanga tried to go on the toes and cut but the bounce beat him

Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs tharanga gets going with an inside edge, oh well, what's new you say, throws his bat from the crease at one close to off stump, but it goes fine on the leg side past the keeper
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run bit of away shape for Dougie, but this time Tharanga leaves outside off
Lee to Dilshan, 1 run shortish and he latches on to the pull right away, keeps it along the ground through square leg too, rolling his wrists over the ball
Lee to Upul Tharanga, 1 run plays late, well done, allows the length ball to come in with the angle, and drops it towards midwicket
Lee to Dilshan, no run Dilshan looking for the swat-punch through extra cover, Lee bowls a slower one back of a length, and Dilshan cannot get any timing on the shot

Lee to Dilshan, 1 run well played, but Ponting at backward point rolls back the years with a dive to his left and a one-handed stop, Dilshan had used Lee's pace very well to open the face and push through the line, that was travelling
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run some width outside off but tharanga finds Ponting this time with the cut
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run even more width, and much fuller outside off, Tharanga eagerly goes on the front foot to bash it through extra cover but hits it back down the track as he gets too across
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run the ball is coming on nicely, but Dilshan's push finds short extra cover as he gets forward to a length ball going across
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run Doug is finding a lot of bounce from this harmless looking pitch, beats Dilshan who has a go at one leaving him with the angle
Bollinger to Dilshan, FOUR runs clobber! that is in Dilshan's slot, pitched up, wide and full outside off, he gets forward and cracks it off the middle through extra cover, bothering to run? don't
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run similar delivery, and Dilshan gets forward to thump it again, not that wide though, and he cannot time the shot, is pretty cross with himself and waves the bat in disgust
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run shortish delivery and Dilshan shapes up for the pull, he is late on the shot as Dougie finds some pace on it and hits it on the bounce to short midwicket
Bollinger to Dilshan, FOUR runs width available and Dilshan goes after it, thick outside edge but it has flown to the third man boundary
Lee to Upul Tharanga, 1 run he is playing Lee with the angle as he comes from round the stumps, and works him towards square leg
Lee to Dilshan, no run looks to pounce on one just outside off stump but mistimes it towards covers
Lee to Dilshan, 1 run straight on middle stump, Dilshan pushes in front of mid on and takes off for the single

Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run nast bouncer from Lee and he gives the look to Tharanga as well, angled in from wide of the crease, gets big on Tharanga and almost hits him near the throat, he just manages to get out of the way
Lee to Upul Tharanga, 1 run well done, arching back and using the angle from a length to steer to third man
Lee to Dilshan, no run 136.3 kph from Lee, and Dilshan goes pushing in the air off the front foot, ball falls short of the man at mid off, not quite driving length but he he had a go
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run tries to use the pace to guide a back of a length ball it wide of point but hits it straight to the man

Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run beats him outside off stump, straightish one on a length, holding its line just a bit as Doug slows it down, Tharanga came forward but the lack of pace did him and he had a loose prod at it
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run worked on the leg side off the pads
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, 1 run they take on midwicket for the single, as there is a fumble there, and make it safely in the end as the throw from David Hussey is wide of the keeper

Bollinger to Dilshan, OUT there is no getting away this time, Doug's bounce has done Dilshan, he has been getting it to take off consistently, Dilshan's instinct is to go after it as it bounces close to off stump, too high he finds out as he gets an edge on its way to Haddin

Bollinger to Sangakkara, 4 leg byes he has ducked right in to the bouncer, Doug is really troubling them with the short of a length balls, it did not get up outside off as much as Sanga expected and he rammed his helmet in to it as he got down, it went past the slip
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run in to the left-hander with the angle, and defended towards cover

Lee to Upul Tharanga, OUT Lee has gone through Tharanga, pretty ordinary shot and the stumps are splattered, it was the slower one from Lee, 125.3 kph, full and on the stumps, Tharanga just had a huge heave at it, and played all over it
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run solid defensive block from Mahela, as he shuffles across to a back of a length ball on off
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs uses the width and caresses the length ball past point from the crease
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run whoa, that was close, Mahela tried to get on top of a rising back of a length ball and run it towards third man, inside edge almost bowled him
Lee to Sangakkara, no run carefully gets forward and defends one hurled in fuller from round the stumps close to off
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run slants it across Mahela from a length, it is just a touch wide outside off, and he lets it go
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run another one going across Mahela at 128.4 kph, that looked faster than that, Mahela shoulders arms
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run slowish one at 114.9 kph on middle, Mahela waits on the crease and twirls the blade to pick up a single on the leg side close to the pitch
Bollinger to Sangakkara, 1 leg bye on the pads from Doug with the angle and Sanga shuffles across to flick it to long leg, the Australians think there was something to it, it would have gone down leg
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run the short ball from Doug again, rises on Mahela who goes on his toes to keep it down, could do with a short leg probably

Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs Mahela shows all his touch and class now, forward to a pitched up ball and caresses it past cover, lovely straight followthrough, no violence, no furious shuffling
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run right on off stump from a length, 137.1 kph, defended down the track
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run fuller on the pads and he flicks it neatly to deep square leg
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run now Mitch finds bounce from back of a length, it comes slowly off the track, and Mahela shuffles across and drops it fine on the leg side
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run confusion between the batsman, Sanga pushed towards extra cover and took off, Mahela followed, the both stopped mid way, and eventually got back
Johnson to Sangakkara, 2 runs well down the pads as this one comes in a bit and he flicks behind square leg
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run gets forward and across, crouches and pushes past point
Watson to Sangakkara, no run and starts off with a shortish one in to Sanga who pushes it towards mid on
Watson to Sangakkara, no run trying to angle it across the left-hander, he gets forward and pushes back to the bowler
Watson to Sangakkara, 1 run down the leg side but Sanga decides to put bat to it and sends it in front of square leg
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run slower one from Watto, 117.7 kph, it was full but Mahela seemed to pick it late and carefully patted it towards mid on in the end
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs easily done, uses the width outside off to open the face and run it wide of third man
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run gets forward and across to push towards mid on
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run just holding its line a bit around off stump, and Sanga gets forward to push it down the track
Johnson to Sangakkara, 2 runs superb shot, moving away from a fuller length, and Sanga gets beside it and opens the face to squeeze it between cover and point
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run goes full for middle and leg, Sanga gets bat around pad to drive towards mid on
Johnson to Sangakkara, 2 runs misfield at short extra cover who dives towards his right, gets a hand to it but lets it through, Sanga had cracked the drive off the front foot
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run pushed in to the off side off the front foot
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run bounces from back of a length, he opens the face to push towards point
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run and Ponting goes sprawling to his right at backward point to cut off the single, that would have been a super effort even from a man ten years younger
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run worked towards square leg for a single
Watson to Sangakkara, no run nudged off the pads straight to short fine leg
Watson to Sangakkara, 1 run well played, saw this one rising outside off, and glided it down to third man
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run hangs the bat outside off and opens the face to get it down to third man, Watson cutting it in from outside off
Watson to Sangakkara, 1 run comes in with the angle, and Sanga pushes a touch inside the line to get a thickish edge to third man
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run solid straight-batted block from Sanga as he comes forward to a fullish one on off
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run moving away from back of a length and bouncing as well, he pushes towards point
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run tests him out with the bouncer, and Sanga goes down calmly under it
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run gets across and pushes firmly off the front foot but gets it straight to Mitch who fields in his followthrough
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run no room at all for Sanga on this one, right on a length on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run arches back and guides a length ball past point for a single
Watson to Sangakkara, 1 run allows it to come on and opens the face from close to the body to run it to third man
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run good delivery, coming in from a length on off stump, Mahela gets behind it to block
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run sees width outside off and tries to get the single to third man with a dab, and is beaten
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run the dab works for him this time as Watto gives lots of width outside off with the cutter, third man has some work to do
Watson to Sangakkara, 1 run cuts in from outside off stump, but is a touch shortish and is slapped away to sweeper cover
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run goes on the toes to keep a rising one down on the off side
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run well bowled, Mitch lets the near-yorker rip right on middle, not completely in the blockhole, and Sanga is able to dig it out
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run now the slower one, 121.1 kph outside off and he mistimes the push to mid on
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run tries the yorker again, but it goes screaming on the pads, he flicks well but on the bounce towards midwicket

Johnson to Sangakkara, 2 runs fine shot, helped through square leg off the pads, that was travelling fast, but Lee the athlete comes bounding in from long leg, slides and gets body behind the ball, scoops it up to the man who has run in from deep midwicket
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run beats him now outside off stump with a slow cutter, Sanga early in to the shot
Johnson to Sangakkara, FOUR runs and gives it away last ball with one full on the pads, Sanga gets across and flicks it wristily to the long leg boundary
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run slides it full around middle and leg, pushed down the track
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run similar delivery, not much turn, pushed towards mid on
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run uses the angle to work behind square off the pads
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run turn from outside off this time, he uses it as he gets across and works through square leg
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run turn again from outside off, but is flat and shortish, and is cut in front of point
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run flat and turning in on off from a length, he goes back to push to the bowler, pretty tidy over first up
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run straight away around middle from a length, he carefully pushes it on the leg side
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run is squared up a tad, opens the face and steers one from close to the body past the man at wide slip, could be dangerous if it does not come off
Bollinger to Sangakkara, no run arrests the forward movement to work one fired in with the angle on middle and leg to midwicket
Bollinger to Sangakkara, 1 run getting up from back of a length, calmly chopped past point for a single
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run solidly forward to a length ball and blocks it towards mid off, holds the pose for an instant, high elbow, straight bat, click away
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run hangs the bat away from the body at a wide one, and gets it just past the man at wide slip, third man is squarish but he will get to it in the end
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run flattish one guided towards point from the crease
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run down the track, but almost yorks him as he gets too close to the pitch of a flighted one, Doherty fields as he manages to push it back in the air
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run gets the single to long on with a push with the turn
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run now Mahela gets forward and earns the single to long off with the turn
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run forward and works to midwicket
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run leaves the crease but doherty pushes it through quicker and he works it straight to midwicket again
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run hit on the body as Doug gets one to hold its line from back of a length, Mahela was getting forward to tackle the angle and missed the waft in the end
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide zippy delivery from short of a length, Mahela withdraws his bat, it is a touch widish and called a wide, Doug is not impressed
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run has him going on his toes to keep a back of a length ball down on the off side
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run fuller on the stumps this time, he cannot work it past midwicket
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run the angle takes the length delivery past Mahela who flags it through
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run this one did not get up much from short of a length, Mahela adjusted to work it on the leg side
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run gets forward to a fuller one and manages to clip it in front of square leg
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run shortish and outside off, arches back and cuts fiercely, to point
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run slowish one middle and leg, played out on the leg side
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run well bowled, tossed up and turning away full outside off, he goes for the drive away from the body, and it runs towards short third man
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run gets forward and pushes a length ball even as it bounces a tad, in front of cover
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run gets the single down to long off with the turn
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run down the track, he slows it down as he tosses it up outside off, and Sanga finds midwicket with the work
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run good delivery, Mahela goes poking at one leaving him outside off stump and tries to run it to third man, beaten
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run succeeds this time as he gets across and pushes from close to the body, single to third man
Johnson to Sangakkara, 2 runs Sanga clips off the pads, in the air but past midwicket, and he will come back for the second to bring up yet another 50 stand between them
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run drops a length ball in front of square on the off side but cannot steal the single as a fielder is close by
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run bit of an inside edge as he gets forward to push at a length ball, the ball is not coming on as well now
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run gets well forward and opens the face to push straight to point

Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs Mahela decides it is time, comes down the track as he sees mid on in the circle, takes on the flighted one on leg stump, and lofts against the turn, over midwicket
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pushes a tossed up ball around off towards cover
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run more flight from Doherty, Mahela defends with a straight bat
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run quicker and flatter, he slashes to backward point
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs well run, a forward push past cover and it is wide enough to the man in the deep for them to come back for the second
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run fuller one pushed away to covers
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run Ponting at backward point has saved lots of runs today, and Sanga cannot push this one past him
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run slower and fuller one from Mitch around 128 kph, Sanga adjusts to push it down the pitch
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run Ponting lets one slip past him, and does not like that, got quickly to his left but the ball slipped past him off Sanga's push
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run hops in the air and fends a rising shortish one fine on the leg side
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run Mitch goes full on the pads in search of the yorker and Sanga whips him in front of square
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run straight on off stump from a length, Mahela carefully defends
Lee to Sangakkara, no run angles it in full around off, and he comes forward to push to mid off
Lee to Sangakkara, 2 runs gets across, down the track and outside the line as Lee bends it in full, flicks him in front of square leg
Lee to Sangakkara, 1 run high full toss from Lee now, he adjusts to push towards cover
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run straight and full one outside off, he gets forward and defends down the track, they are finding it difficult to work the ball away
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run lovely from Lee, moving away from short of a length on off stump, Mahela pushes inside the line and is beaten
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run has him forward and defending solidly to short extra cover to end an excellent over

Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run chance for a run out, but Mike Hussey lobs it well over the stumps as he runs across and dives towards the ball at extra cover, Sanga had pushed a length ball and taken off right away

Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run he has been a touch loose outside off today, Mitch pitched it up for the drive, Mahela goes at it only with the bat and not the feet, and does not make any contact

Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run and again, floated wider and moving away further, Mahela moves across and goes for another drive, Haddin takes it diving to his right, Australia are sure there was an edge, umpire Asoka is equally sure there wasn't, Australia go for the review, the bat is nowhere near the ball, it was the sound of bat hitting ground but the ball was quite a few inches away
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs Mahela gets bat on ball now, shuffles well across and gets it off his hip fine down the leg side
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide too wide this time outside off stump, even Mahela in this want-to-drive mood won't go after that

Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run dropped, what an over this has been, Mahela continues to go after full ones outside off, this time he gets an edge, but Haddin tumbles to his right, gets it in his gloves and it pops out, so a wasted review of a catch that wasn't and in the end a catch that almost was
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pushed away on the off side solidly, Mahela is done with the adventures for this over
Doherty to Sangakkara, 2 wide pushed through quicker down the leg side and Haddin cannot collect as he takes it on the right thumb
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run worked away through square leg

Doherty to Sangakkara, OUT Sanga goes this time, he comes down the track, and does what he had been wanting to for quite some time, gets to the pitch and connects well with the lofted shot, but he has got it too flat and Lee takes a fine tumbling catch at long on, so Doherty breaks the stand for Australia, it had started to assume slightly worrisome proportions
Doherty to Silva, no run pushed away on the off side, it was short and turning away, but he mistimed the cut

Doherty to Silva, OUT another one, Doherty strikes again, Silva has gone for nothing, pushing forward to one pitching on the off stump, it does not turn and goes on with the angle, he plays for it, outside the line as a result, is struck on the pads, and is given right away, that would have hit leg
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run flat one outside off stump, he cuts it off the back foot to sweeper cover
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up delivery pushed down the track
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs Mahela taking his chances with this one, gets forward and reaches out to pick it from outside off stump over mid on
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run fuller one slanted in and worked to midwicket
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run right on off stump from a length, Mahela presses forward to defend solidly
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pushed down towards mid on off the front foot
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run cuts in from short of a length outside off, Mahela stays in the crease and plays it out on the off side
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run uses the angle and works it off the pads in front of square leg
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run Ponting gets some bad bounce at backward point as Mahela runs a length ball towards him, but he gets body behind the ball and is able to stop it
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run pushes a length ball wide of extra cover and gets through for the single
Bollinger to Eranga, 1 run gives him the short ball, he awkwardly jabs it away on the leg side behind square
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run going across Mahela on a length, around off, and he comes forward to defend
Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, no run chopped from the crease on the bounce to backward point

Bollinger to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs fine stroke from Mahela, he played a similar one at the start of his innings, forward to one going across and caresses it past extra cover, elegance all the way
Lee to Eranga, OUT and gets one first ball, Eranga tries to hop in the air and cut a bouncing short one outside off, picks out third man who does not have to move at all
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run coming in with the angle on off, Mahela defends carefully
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run low full toss at 128.1 kph, Mahela pats it away, extra caution coming in with all those wickets
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run that is a brute, that has taken off from short of a length, Mahela hops as he fends it away to third man, and refuses the single as No 9 comes jogging across
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs drives a pitched up delivery wide of sweeper cover and acknowledges the applause for a pain-staking 50
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run goes full but the angle takes it on the pads and he is clipped away through square leg
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run going straight on from a fuller length on off, blocked off the front foot
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run flighted full on leg stump, some turn this time, as Mahela defends
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run pushes a tossed up ball outside off away from the body in front of point
Doherty to Prasanna, no run pushes a away a flat delivery towards point

Doherty to Prasanna, OUT is that another one, Prasanna goes for the review as umpire Hill gives him out leg before, it was the tossed up ball that carried straight in, he pushed outside the line and was struck on the pad, that would have hit middle and off, and Sri Lanka have lost the review, best figures for Xavier Doherty
Doherty to Malinga, no run tossed up invitingly but Malinga lets it go outside off
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run short of a length, Jayawardene is behind it in defence
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run nearly chips a low full toss down mid-on's throat. Doesn't make the best of connections, which is just as well

Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, OUT Binga! Accurate bouncer, Jayawardene looks for the flick-pull, gets a top edge, and Lee runs towards square leg to complete the catch. Huge wicket, Jayawardene could still have hurt Australia
Lee to Malinga, OUT right through him, backing away, Lee keeps it full, moving in late on the stumps, Malinga goes nowhere with the swipe and that is the end of the innings
On another note, Sri Lanka's capitulation has covered up Australia's woeful over-rate. They had more than 11 overs to bowl with barely 25 minutes left

With Silva out of touch, they had five batsmen. Two fell to wild shots, the third found the fielder on his first aggressive shot and the fourth charged blindly as soon as he came in. Too much left for the fifth to do, even if he is of the class of Mahela Jayawardene

This is the fourth-lowest total in a completed first innings in a full game at the Premadasa, and the second-lowest for Sri Lanka. Sums up their performance. They were playing with a long tail today, and Chamara Silva as well, who clearly hasn't got any confidence going. 0, 6, 7, 1, 0, 0 read the scores of the last six batsmen. Once Kumar fell, the rest followed in a heap.

Australia are struggling? They certainly aren't in one-dayers. In the last two years, they have won 46 of their 65 games, a win-loss ratio of 3.06. The closest are South Africa, with a win-loss ratio of 2.
Welcome back for Australia's chase. They need 133 to win another series in Sri Lanka, they won the last bilateral series they played here, in 2003-04. Malinga has the new ball, he will bowl to Watson
Malinga to Watson, 1 run moving away a tad from a length, and Watson with that characteristic late chop down to third man
Malinga to Marsh, no run goes for the stumps with a fuller length, good delivery first up, he opens the face and gets it towards point
Malinga to Marsh, no run he is going for the yorker, ends up as a very low full toss, Marsh gets a bit of bat on it
Malinga to Marsh, no run full delivery, but he is able to get forward to it and push towards extra cover
Malinga to Marsh, no run Malinga rips the yorker at 140.7 kph on leg stump, Marsh gets front leg out of the way and manages to jab it away, almost falls over with the effort
Malinga to Marsh, no run length delivery this time on the middle stump, he is not getting forward understandably with all those grenades hurled full at him, plays it out carefully
Mendis to Watson, no run almost through him first up, goes straight on quickly from a length, Watson late in getting forward and manages an inside edge
Mendis to Watson, no run turns away a bit from off, he pushes with an open face to point
Mendis to Watson, no run hurrying on at 86.9 kph, he backs away for the cut and is beaten
Mendis to Watson, no run another one that almost goes through him, tossed up full on middle stump, turns in, but another inside edge saves Watson
Mendis to Watson, FOUR runs he will put this one way, sitting up short outside off, and he cracks it in front of point
Mendis to Watson, no run flighted right on middle stump, superb over apart from that boundary ball, Watson gets forward and defends on the off side
Dilshan to Marsh, FOUR runs flighted but full and very wide outside off, Marsh gets forward and puts it away through extra cover
Dilshan to Marsh, no run beats him on the cut outside off with a flat and shortish one
Dilshan to Marsh, FOUR runs this one will go, short again and sitting up, enough bounce on it for Marsh to rock back and time it past cover
Dilshan to Marsh, no run pushed away on the off side
Dilshan to Marsh, no run tosses it up on off stump and he gets forward to defend
Dilshan to Marsh, no run pushes off the front foot towards cover
Mendis to Watson, FOUR runs brutal from Watson, tosses it up, ends up as a low full toss, and Watson bashes it violently back towards the bowler, who does not attempt to grab at it, very wise choice
Mendis to Watson, no run reaches well forward to push one away towards mid off
Mendis to Watson, 1 run goes through Malinga at short third man, as Watson rocks back and thumps the cut off a short and flat one
Mendis to Marsh, no run dropped, guided straight to slip and goes right through his hands, it flew off the face of the bat, and got too quickly on to Mahela
Mendis to Marsh, no run pushed away on the leg side from a length
Mendis to Marsh, no run well left, floated up fullish outside off, but he lets it go
Malinga to Watson, no run hurls a high full toss at Watson, dipped as it came on to Watson who hopped and kept it down on the leg side
Malinga to Watson, no run defends a length ball as he comes forward
Malinga to Watson, 1 run bit of width outside off and he sends it to third man with a quick flash of the hands
Malinga to Marsh, no run he is expecting the full delivery and is caught on the crease, but Malinga rips the bouncer outside off, and he withdraws the bat in the end
Malinga to Marsh, no run now comes the full delivery outside leg stump, he shuffles, gets bat around pad and works it to square leg
Malinga to Marsh, no run low dipping incoming full toss, he is clearly not finding it very comfortable against Malinga, adjusts late to jab it towards midwicket
Mendis to Watson, 1 run short, flat and punched through the non-striker
Mendis to Marsh, no run digs out a full delivery on the pads towards midwicket
Mendis to Marsh, no run turns away a bit from the left-hander as it is tossed up at an angle across him, he gets forward and shoulders arms
Mendis to Marsh, no run gets across and pushes solidly to covers
Mendis to Marsh, FOUR runs well done, sees this one flighted full on middle and leg, he shuffles forward, gets to the pitch and drives it softly past the bowler
Mendis to Marsh, 2 runs worked on the leg side
Malinga to Ponting, no run goes fullish on the off stump, Ponting shuffles well across and keeps it out on the leg side
Malinga to Ponting, no run slower and much fuller, patted back to the bowler

Malinga to Ponting, no run almost a run-out, Ponting purposefully comes forward, pushes to extra cover and takes another step out, that is enough hint for Marsh who takes off in a blaze, but has to turn back half-way up the track and get back in time as the throw comes in
Malinga to Clarke, no run oh he almost bowled him, Malinga knows it and smiles, the slowish yorker first up, but Clarke manages to keep it out, barely
Kulasekara to Marsh, FOUR runs and is put away behind square leg first ball, on the pads and Marsh flicks it neatly
Kulasekara to Marsh, no run better from Kula, pitched up and going across the left-hander, who gets an inside edge as he presses forward, a touch late
Kulasekara to Marsh, no run pushes off the back foot towards mid on
Kulasekara to Marsh, FOUR runs short, wide and that has been put away by Marsh, got on top of it and crashed it in front of cover, not timed that well but enough to beat the fielder
Kulasekara to Marsh, no run moving away from a length on middle, well bowled, he defends awkwardly
Kulasekara to Marsh, no run pegging away with the angle across Marsh, a bit fuller and he pushes it towards cover
Malinga to Clarke, no run pitched up full just outside off, Clarke carefully opens the face and runs it to point
Malinga to Clarke, no run on a length and headed for middle and leg, he crouches and defends with extreme caution
Malinga to Clarke, no run lets the bouncer rip now, it comes out of nowhere after all those full deliveries, Clarke was not expecting it, and just managed to get his head under the line
Malinga to Clarke, no run pitched up now, he realises it late and gets forward to push it towards mid off
Malinga to Clarke, no run solid this time from Clarke, forward to a fullish one and drives it to mid off
Malinga to Clarke, no run tries to angle it in full around middle, but Clarke gets bat to it and pushes to mid on, Malinga has hands on his head
Kulasekara to Marsh, FOUR runs outside edge, but goes past the man at wide slip and beats third man running to his right as well, Marsh not getting well across to one leaving him outside off
Kulasekara to Marsh, no run pushes a length ball back to the bowler
Kulasekara to Marsh, no run straightish one on a length on middle, played out towards midwicket
Kulasekara to Marsh, no run puts front foot a long way down the track, and gets bat around it to defend
Kulasekara to Marsh, 1 run too much leg stump from Kula and he flicks to deep square leg
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run left alone outside the off stump
Eranga to Marsh, no run finds lots of bounce from a length on off stump as he angles it across the left-hander, he has a go at it but is beaten by the carry
Eranga to Marsh, no run now this one does not get up much as it pitches outside off and carries on with the angle, he is beaten on the cut this time
Eranga to Marsh, no run gets bat on ball this time and pushes a length ball to point
Eranga to Marsh, 3 runs slower one at 112.9 kph down the pads and flicked through square leg, Clarke was late in coming back for the third and had the throw been on the stumps, he was in trouble
Eranga to Clarke, no run finds some bounce from just short of a length, he pushes it back to the bowler
Eranga to Clarke, no run shuffles and works it straight to short midwicket who turns and finds the non-striker
Prasanna to Marsh, no run tossed up full around off, blocked off the front foot
Prasanna to Marsh, FOUR runs how's that for timing? tossed up full and wide, he gets to the pitch and carves it through extra cover, that just flew in to the boundary
Prasanna to Marsh, no run pushed towards extra cover off the front foot
Prasanna to Marsh, no run steady delivery full around middle, defended down the track
Prasanna to Marsh, no run not much turn, he is just sliding them across, defended down the track
Prasanna to Marsh, no run pushed away on the leg side
Eranga to Clarke, 1 run fine stroke from Clarke, busily get forward in to a firm push that just beats extra cover and earns him a single
Eranga to Marsh, no run slanted across the left-hander, no need to play at it as he did in the previous over and got beaten, left alone this time
Eranga to Marsh, no run thickish outside edge as he pushes at a fuller one, goes towards point
Eranga to Marsh, no run gets across and keeps down a rising length ball around off
Eranga to Marsh, no run solid front foot push as he takes a step down the track, he is looking better now, mid off fields
Eranga to Marsh, no run watches one go across him outside off, he might have gone after that earlier but seems more at ease now
Prasanna to Clarke, no run full delivery pushed down the track
Prasanna to Clarke, no run Clarke down the track, takes it on the full and eases it towards extra cover
Prasanna to Clarke, no run phew, what was that, that was unbelievable, that has pitched close to outside leg and just zipped across a bemused Clarke, the keeper takes it well outside off stump
Prasanna to Clarke, 1 run have to hand it to Clarke, next ball after that snorter, he decides to abandon the crease, takes it on the half-volley and works it towards midwicket
Prasanna to Marsh, 1 leg bye nudged on the leg side for a single
Prasanna to Clarke, FOUR runs drops it too short, and Clarke takes toll, rocks back and hammers the pull over midwicket

Eranga to Marsh, 1 run pushes a length ball on the off side and takes off for the single, an advancing mid off almost runs straight in to him, and has to leap over the stumps as he avoids Marsh, Dilshan it is
Eranga to Clarke, no run solid dead-bat from Clarke as he defends on the off side
Eranga to Clarke, no run comes in a long way from outside off on a length, he guides it from close to the body towards point
Eranga to Clarke, FOUR runs short, wide, skiddy delivery outside off, he goes after it with the slash and it flies over and past wide slip
Eranga to Clarke, 1 run almost gets in to trouble as he plonks front foot forward and across, this one comes in a long way from outside off, and he somehow manages to get it away towards square leg
Eranga to Marsh, no run moving away from a length on leg stump, he eases forward and presents a solid straight bat
Prasanna to Clarke, no run down the track, takes a tossed up ball on the full, but cannot ease it past mid on
Prasanna to Clarke, FOUR runs this time he will get it past mid on, comes down the track again, and lifts the half-volley over the bowler
Prasanna to Clarke, no run backs away a shade to one pitching on leg stump, and pats it back to the bowler
Prasanna to Clarke, no run forces him to drop short with all those charges, but cannot get the cut past backward point
Prasanna to Clarke, no run takes it on the pad as he leaves the crease again and misses, but he was too far down the track for Sri Lanka's appeal to be upheld
Prasanna to Clarke, no run pushed away on the off side off the front foot
Mendis to Marsh, 1 run flat straightish delivery on leg stump, played out towards square leg
Mendis to Clarke, 1 wide he sprays it very wide outside off with a forward short leg in place
Mendis to Clarke, no run bit of an inside edge as he pushes forward to defend
Mendis to Clarke, no run fuller outside off, he gets forward to smother it
Mendis to Clarke, no run they are playing him out as much as possible, shortish but he just offers a dead-bat
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run tossed up, and he eases forward to pick the single to mid on with a push
Mendis to Marsh, no run turning away from the left-hander a shade around middle, right forward in defence, he has looked alright against Mendis
Prasanna to Clarke, no run tossed up but a touch short and wide, Clarke's cut finds backward point again
Prasanna to Clarke, 1 run goes deep in the crease to work the single wide of midwicket
Prasanna to Marsh, SIX runs that has disappeared, marginally short from Prasanna, and he rocks back to smash it over deep midwicket, almost takes out Percy, the long-time Sri Lankan supporter with it
Prasanna to Marsh, FOUR runs even better, he comes down the track, gets to the pitch and caresses it past extra cover
Prasanna to Marsh, no run pushed down the track off the front foot
Prasanna to Marsh, no run flat one sliding across him, he stays in the crease to defend
Mendis to Clarke, no run tossed up full around off, he gets forward to block
Mendis to Clarke, 2 runs full toss and Clarke forces it through midwicket, Marsh comes back and has to dive in to the crease, direct hit would have been interesting
Mendis to Clarke, 2 runs playing very late as he stays in the crease to one tossed up outside off, allows it come on and dabs it past slip
Mendis to Clarke, no run squared up as this one turns away from leg stump, and the leading edge goes towards extra cover
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run very full one worked off the pads wide of midwicket
Mendis to Marsh, no run straightish on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
Dilshan to Clarke, FOUR runs that will do, shortish and turning on the pads, Clarke swivels deep in the crease and swings it past the square leg umpire
Dilshan to Clarke, 1 run another short one, outside off now, pushed past backward point
Dilshan to Marsh, no run tossed up, pushed towards extra cover off the front foot
Dilshan to Marsh, FOUR runs Marsh puts another one away, short and turning away, he goes back and cuts past point, brings up his 50 too, didn
Dilshan to Marsh, no run pushed away from the crease
Dilshan to Marsh, no run blocked off the front foot down the track
Mendis to Clarke, no run chips a sliddy flat delivery outside off towards point as he backs away for the cut
Mendis to Clarke, no run gets forward and across to block one outside off
Mendis to Clarke, no run turning away a bit from outside off, he gets forward, head on top of ball to block
Mendis to Clarke, no run looks to come down the track initially then stops and tries to work it off the pads, cannot get it away
Mendis to Clarke, no run dropped very tough chance, worked with the turn firmly straight to forward short leg, he could not hold on, it was Chamara
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run worked in to the leg side in front of square leg
Malinga to Clarke, no run slung on a length widish outside off, left alone watchfully
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run goes for the yorker, not full enough, he gets it away on the off side with an inside edge on to pad
Malinga to Marsh, FOUR runs low full toss now down the pads, and Marsh puts it wide of long leg
Malinga to Marsh, 2 runs again on the pads from a full length, he shuffles and nudges it fine on the leg side
Malinga to Marsh, no run well bowled, slings it across the left-hander full close to off, has him pushing from the crease, and beats him with some late away movement
Malinga to Marsh, no run arrives the yorker on the stumps at 138.2 kph, Marsh shuffles about and keeps it out
Mendis to Clarke, no run meanwhile, clarke continues to use his feet but his bat cannot will the ball past midwicket
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run now he goes back in the crease and nudges square on the leg side
Mendis to Marsh, 2 runs turning away from a length on off, he goes back and cuts it through point
Mendis to Marsh, 2 runs tossed up but too full and Marsh eases it through extra cover, sweeper cover gets around to it in the end
Mendis to Marsh, no run punched off the back foot towards mid on
Mendis to Marsh, 1 run allows it to turn away from a length and pushes it past point
Malinga to Marsh, 1 run well done, opens the face and guides a yorker from outside off to third man, the man has grown in confidence alright
Malinga to Clarke, no run sprayed widish outside off stump and left alone

Malinga to Clarke, no run Sri Lanka go for the review, Malinga let the yorker rip on leg stump, and Clarke was hit on the pad as he missed the flick, not given, was that headed down leg, it is, looked like a no-ball as well in fact
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run goes for it again, he can produce them at will, Clarke manages a fortunate inside edge as he gets bat down
Malinga to Marsh, 1 run another one let loose full on the stumps, Marsh is squared up but gets it away towards point
Malinga to Clarke, no run he keeps coming at them without any let-up, but they keep digging out those yorkers, and near-yorkers, and low full tosses
Prasanna to Marsh, FOUR runs short, sitting up and Marsh gets back quickly to pull it in to over midwicket
Prasanna to Marsh, 2 runs worked in the leg side for a couple
Prasanna to Marsh, 1 run down the ground for another run to long on
Prasanna to Clarke, 1 run punched off the back foot towards cover
Prasanna to Marsh, no run hit on the pad outside leg as he tries to work a dipping tossed up delivery on the leg side, ball goes towards cover
Prasanna to Marsh, no run pushed back down the track
Eranga to Clarke, no run pushed off the front foot towards mid off
Eranga to Clarke, 1 run uses the angle to work a back of a length ball in front of square leg
Eranga to Marsh, no run cuts one leaving him with the angle but straight to point
Eranga to Marsh, 1 leg bye shuffles and nudges one off the pads behind square leg
Eranga to Clarke, 1 wide tries the short ball, and he allows it go past him close to off, called wide for height
Eranga to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke takes the slower and fuller one on, gets forward and lofts it cleanly over mid off
Eranga to Clarke, no run fires it in full around leg stump, Clarke flicks to midwicket
Prasanna to Hussey, no run tossed up in to leg stump, pushed away to silly point off the front foot
Prasanna to Haddin, no run tossed up slowly on middle and leg stump, he comes forward to defend
Prasanna to Haddin, no run drives a tossed up delivery to mid on, and brings to an end an over that Prasanna will never forget
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run coming in late and goes down the pads full, Clarke picks it away to long leg
Malinga to Haddin, no run almost sneaked through, tails in full on off stump with unfailing certainty, Haddin gets some bat on it, he was late in getting down on it
Malinga to Haddin, no run another yorker, a bowling machine could have deviated but not Malinga, on off stump and he digs it out
Malinga to Haddin, FOUR runs slings it full and wide, and Haddin goes after it, gets it high in the air but it clears the infield and trickles in to the deep cover boundary
Malinga to Haddin, 1 run eep, that was fired in and headed high and full for Haddin, but dipped on him late and he got it towards square leg off the thigh pad
Malinga to Clarke, 4 leg byes full down the pads and he gets it away fine on the leg side, that will do for Australia

Australia have back-to-back series wins in Sri Lanka, they won here in 2003-04 as well. It was a pretty safe chase till Marsh's dismissal led to two more wickets in the same over from debutant Prasanna. Sri Lanka's thin batting line-up caved in cheaply after Sangakkara fell, and there was no getting back from that.
Kumar Sangakkara gets a memento for playing 300 ODIs

Australia won by 5 wickets (with 132 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Xavier Doherty, AUS
